Text: MAIN Committee MembersAttached is a list of committee members approved at the annual meeting held November R A Bulley bcommtermsdoc

MAIN Board of Directors Conference CallA hour MAIN Board of Directors conference call to approve the ARTO contract is scheduled for Monday October at am CST Please dial and give the operator the company name MAIN and the host name Richard Bulley R A Bulley

New MAIN Member Cc I am pleased to announce that the Administrative Committee has accepted the application of our new regular member effective October Allegheny Energy Supply Company LLC We look forward to their participation in our activities As soon as they become available a list of contacts for the various committees will be added to MAINs home page R A Bulley

New MAIN Member Cc I am pleased to announce that the Administrative Committee has accepted the application of our new regular member effective October NRG Energy Inc IndeckRockford LLC is currently a member of MAIN and has been purchased by NRG NRG will survive IndeckRockford as the MAIN member We look forward to their participation in our activities As soon as they become available a list of contacts for the various committees will be added to MAINs home page R A Bulley
